attributes.contentHtml:
Hello! So today I was searching on disboard and found a hosting, it seemed kinda sus, so I said: "Hey! Why not join it?", welp, I asked for their ToS and Privacy Policy, and no one responded. I've looked through the server and found a lot of funny stuff:
( https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/839184121657425940/840322586055016488/Screenshot_2021-05-07-22-18-28-06.jpg
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/839184121657425940/840322586302218260/Screenshot_2021-05-07-22-17-55-20.jpg
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/839184121657425940/840322586570129459/Screenshot_2021-05-07-22-17-07-99.jpg
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/839184121657425940/840322586802126899/Screenshot_2021-05-07-22-16-40-39.jpg)
Also, the most funny thing about it, it's that when I provided proof of they getting alts, the owner INSTANTLY came offline, lmfao
(https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/839184121657425940/840322587409252402/Screenshot_2021-05-07-22-12-07-23.jpg)

attributes.title: Eclipse | Probably no ToS/PP | Selling illegal stuff and very funny

attributes.contentHtml: babyharpseal man out here providing free hosting u people never happy smh
